string.text: You're approaching the Barrier. Don't even think about messing around. We'll be more than happy to accept any help though.
Marked One, get over here for your share and further instructions
Marked One, go back to your position
If you spend the whole night at the Tower in the village something is GUARANTEED to happen...
Don't forget the mines! One mistake and you're toast...
Be careful, Marked One. Apparently there's a new anomaly in the village. The bastard's fast and invisible!

Attention all those wishing to liquefy their brains: the road to the Red forest is protected by a Monolith unit and as you probably know those guys shoot first and don't ask questions later. Good luck.
Our job here is done. Retreat to the farmstead. We will sort out the payment there.
Forward boys! The way is clear!
Marked One, take down those snipers!
Be careful, Marked One, or you'll catch a bullet...
